function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased competition for resources in a destabilized world","Impact":"Resource scarcity and conflicts leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable resource management and conflict resolution strategies","Technologies":"Sustainable resource extraction and management technologies, conflict resolution technologies","People":"Global population, resource-dependent communities","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, local communities"},{"Description":"Shifting economic systems and development within social and planetary boundaries","Impact":"Inadequate access to healthcare and sanitation, leading to higher disease transmission rates","Mitigation":"Investment in public health infrastructure and equitable access to healthcare and sanitation facilities","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, sanitation technology, telemedicine","People":"Underprivileged communities, developing countries","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Anthropocentric worldview and its impact on disease transmission","Impact":"Neglect of environmental factors contributing to disease spread and lack of emphasis on preventive measures","Mitigation":"Promotion of environmental mindfulness and education on disease prevention","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technology, educational technology","People":"General population, educational institutions","Owner":"Educational institutions, public health organizations"}]}
